channel.title: Homes on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Shiqi Ye (叶仕奇)

item.description: Shiqi Ye is a final year Ph.D. candidate at the the Gregory and Paula Chow Institute for Economics Research, Xiamen University, supervised by Professor Tingguo Zheng. He is also an exchange Ph.D. student at the Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences, supervised by Professor Yongmiao Hong. His research interests include time-series econometrics, applied macroeconometrics, and financial econometrics. He received the Young Econometrician ANZESG Award from Professor Peter C.
